title: Table Cover, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork and embroidery
description: Oblong table cover of white linen with cutwork bands across the ends in simple geometric patterns and highly stylized embroidered designs in tan and blue-green. Narrow border, half inch, of cutwork and simple embroidered design surrounds the entire cover. Narrow looped fringe in the same tan and blue-green trims the piece.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, 16th century.Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork and embroidery. 1952-162-121.
